author: Michelle-TalkTalk
title: Re: New Fibre 900 installation, Eero Pro 6 Wifi is really disappointing
text:
Weâ€™re here 24/7. 365 days a year.
Ask questions. Find your answers. Connect.
yesterday
Hi
New installation of Fibre 900 today with two Eero Pro 6 boxes.
All set up and working, speed from the main box is great, getting 938 Mbps download and 108 Mbps upload according to the apps speed test.
However the wifi is a different story altogether. Using my iPhone 16 Pro, if I stand next to the main router I get approx 590ish, as I walk away from it, it just keeps dropping until its getting around 100-150ish.
I have the other Eero box upstairs in the closest available space, quite open, just a couple of walls between the main Eero router. (New build house, walls are not very thick)
Even upstairs, standing next to the second Eero the speed is about 160. If I plug my PC into the second box I get speeds of about 550 Mbps.
I've updated both to the latest software as notified in the app.
Very disappointed with it, would appreciate any help!
34 minutes ago
Morning,
Can you please update your community profile to include your:
We'll then look into this further. Please do not post this information on this thread. Once you've updated your profile please post in your topic to confirm it's updated.
Thanks
Michelle
yesterday
Just to add to this, I've just been reading about others who have had very similar issues that were caused by the 5ghz channels being too high for devices. Both my 5ghz channels are 42 & 155.

author: Jesica Constantino Aguilar" data-date-published="28/12/2023
title: Tiroteos en Estados Unidos durante 2023 dejan 42 mil muertos, mÃ¡s de mil 600 son niÃ±os
text:
Los tiroteos registrados durante 2023 en Estados Unidos dejaron un saldo de mÃ¡s de 42 mil muertos en todo el paÃ­s, de los cuales mÃ¡s de mil fueron niÃ±os , de acuerdo con datos proporcionados por Gun Violence Archive (GAV), un sitio web nacional que rastrea las muertes y lesiones por armas de fuego.
GAV especificÃ³ que en este aÃ±o se registraron 650 tiroteos masivos en el paÃ­s norteamericano, que dejaron 42 mil 422 muertos, de los cuales mil 657 fueron menores de 17 aÃ±os; ademÃ¡s de 35 mil 909 heridos, de los cuales cuatro mil 463 fueron niÃ±os menores de 17 aÃ±os.
La violencia armada se ha convertido en un grave problema de seguridad para Estados Unidos, cabe recordar que Gun Violence Archive define tiroteo masivo como un evento con al menos cuatro vÃ­ctimas heridas o muertas, sin incluir al tirador.
| Reuters En las primeras seis semanas del aÃ±o ya se habÃ­an reportado 72 t iroteos masivos que dejaron dos mil 237 muertos; es decir que para entonces habÃ­an ocurrido mÃ¡s ataques con armas que dÃ­as transcurridos.
SegÃºn los datos recolectados durante todo el aÃ±o por GAV, Estados Unidos ocupa el primer lugar mundial por incidentes de tiroteos masivos, ademÃ¡s de propiedad individual de armas de fuego.
Tiroteo en Maine, el peor ocurrido durante 2023 en Estados Unidos El tiroteo de Maine se convirtiÃ³ en el mÃ¡s mortÃ­fero de este 2023 en Estados Unidos. OcurriÃ³ el 25 de octubre, cuando Robert Card, un militar, disparÃ³ indiscriminadamente contra dos negocios, u restaurante y un centro de bolos.
El ataque dejÃ³ un saldo de 18 muertos y 13 heridos. El tirador huyÃ³ del lugar, por lo que las autoridades comenzaron con la bÃºsqueda y captura del sujeto.
Tras 48 horas de buscarlo, las autoridades encontraron su cuerpo dentro de una camioneta dentro de una planta de reciclaje; posteriormente la autopsia indicÃ³ que el sujeto se quitÃ³ la vida.
Las autoridades informaron que el hombre sufrÃ­a de paranoia e indicaron que esa pudo ser la causa del tiroteo que cometiÃ³.
Noticias mÃ¡s importantes del 2023 Â¡No te pierdas nuestro contenido, sigue a Fuerza Informativa Azteca en Google News! Publicado: 28/12/2023 | ðŸ•‘ 16:01 | Actualizado ðŸ•‘ 16:04 Notas Mundo Escrito por: Jesica Constantino Aguilar Compartir Tweet CopyLink Copiar enlace WhatsApp Facebook

author: Ryan Ward
title: Colin Cowherd Believes Lakers Will Trade For 1 Star This Offseason
text:
(Photo by Ronald Martinez/Getty Images)
The Los Angeles Lakers were able to keep their season alive recently by taking down the New Orleans Pelicans in the Play-In Tournament, which resulted in LeBron James and company advancing to the first round of the NBA playoffs to take on the defending champion Denver Nuggets.
With the Lakers keeping their season alive, the storied franchise has a chance to pull off a massive upset over Nikola Jokicâ€™s team in the first round and potentially make a deep run or win what would be an NBA-record 18th title.
However, if the Lakers flame out in the first round, which is expected considering the team theyâ€™ll face starting this weekend in Denver, the offseason will be interesting in Los Angeles as thereâ€™s no telling what the franchise will do.
James could leave the team in NBA free agency, but the team could also make a blockbuster trade to convince him to stay, with Trae Young of the Atlanta Hawks being the most likely target.
Colin Cowherd of FOX Sports believes Young will be the next star to land in Los Angeles because his partnership with Dejounte Murray in Atlanta simply isnâ€™t working, and a change is needed, via â€œThe Herd with Colin Cowherd.â€
â€œTrae Young, my guess, is coming to L.A,â€ Cowherd said.
"Trae Young, my guess, is coming to LA."
â€” @ColinCowherd pic.twitter.com/EmXltTY2q7
â€” Herd w/Colin Cowherd (@TheHerd) April 18, 2024
Although a lot can happen between now and when the Lakersâ€™ offseason officially starts, Young heading to Los Angeles in a blockbuster trade makes a lot of sense, with the team needing another star and his representation being Klutch Sports.
Only time will tell what happens in Los Angeles, but itâ€™s safe to assume there will be a major change this summer.

organizations.name: star this offseason the los angeles lakers

author: Jo Abi
title: Meghan Markle news: Serena Williams opens up about their friendship in Time 100 Most Influential People issue - 9Honey
text:
Serena Williams has opened up about her friendship with Meghan Markle , saying they keep in regular contact and even trade recipes.
Williams, 43, spoke about her friendship with the royal in the Time's 100 Most Influential People issue.
The tennis star has been friends with the Duchess of Sussex since the pair met at the Super Bowl in 2010 in Miami, but the pair didn't become "fast friends" until their second encounter at the Super Bowl in 2014 in New York.
READ MORE: Queen Margrethe ï»¿marks 85th birthday with family
Serena Williams has opened up about her friendship with Meghan Markle. (Getty Images for W+P) But now things are different and Williams revealed how close she and the Duchess of Sussex are now, telling Time : "So we're trading recipes."
"I'm always like, 'Girl, what are you doing today?"ï»¿ she continued.
Both Meghan and Williams live on large properties with their families, Meghan in Montecito, California with her husband Prince Harry, and their two children Prince Archie, five, and Princess Lilibet, three, and Williams on a ranch in Florida with Ohanian and daughters Olympia, seven, and Adira, 20 months.
The pair both grow fruit and vegetables on their properties and keep bees.ï»¿
"I never thought I had a green thumb," Serena said. "We get so much honey it's insane."
Meghan most recently shared her own green thumb and bee-keeping skills on her Netflix series With Love, Meghan , Season 2 of which airs later this year.
The tennis star has been friends with the Duchess of Sussex since the pair met at the Super Bowl in 2010. (Getty Images for W+P) Despite not forming an immediate friendship, the ladies recalled the start of their friendship during an episode of Meghan's defunct podcast Archetypes .
Meghan said: "I show up and I see you walking toward someone. I remember thinking, 'Oh my gosh, who is Serena Williams going to talk to?' I looked behind me and when I turned around, you were there right in front of me... We became such fast friends."
READ MORE: Home Alone 2 director wishes Trump cameo 'was gone'ï»¿
Serena Williams and husband Alexis Ohanian attended Meghan and Harry's 2018 wedding. (WireImage) Since then the pair has openly supported one another's ventures with Meghan regularly attending Wimbledon to watch her friend play, including in 2019, and both attending the same events, including the 2024 ESPY Awards in California in 2014.
Williams and husband Alexis Ohanian also attended Prince Harry and Meghan Markle's wedding on May 19 at St George's Chapel, Windsor Castle, in 2018.ï»¿
Following Harry and Meghan's explosive Oprah interview in 2021, Williams described Meghan as a "selfless friend" who "leads by example with empathy and compassion".
"She teaches me every day what it means to be truly noble. Her words illustrate the pain and cruelty she's experienced," she said.ï»¿
For a daily dose of 9honey, subscribe to our newsletter here .
Williams described Meghan as a 'selfless friend' who 'leads by example with empathy and compassion'. (Getty Images for W+P) Fast-forward to 2025 and Meghan and Williams have now been friends for over a decade, sharing the highs and lows of each other's lives.ï»¿
The pair are both close to each other's children, with a photo of Serena playing Candy Land with Princess Lilibet in March shared on Meghan's Instagram Stories.
"When the aunties come to celebrate ...and to play! Love you @serenawilliams," read the caption.
Serena Williams playing the Candy Land board game with Princess Lilibet. (Instagram/Meghan) READ MORE: The cooling blanket that radically changed my sleep
Williams was also one of the lucky recipients of a hamper of products from Meghan's Ever after range, sharing her haul on social media.
"I'm so excited for this," Williams said. "Jam... oh my gosh, crepes!"
When she spotted the tea she said: "You know I love my tea. The one you drink and the one I serve."
It isn't known with A-listers will appear in the second season of With Love, Meghan . Williams would certainly thrill fans if she were to appear.
Season 1 of the show included Mindy Kaling, Roy Choi, Alice Waters, Abigail Spencer, and Daniel Martin.

author: PA News Agency
title: Christmas Eve worshippers to face security screening at Cologne cathedral | Ham & High
text: Cologne police acting on indications of a possible attack searched Germanyâ€™s landmark cathedral with sniffer dogs on Saturday and said worshippers attending Christmas Eve Mass would undergo security screening before being allowed in. In Austria, police in Vienna also said they were taking heightened security measures around churches and Christmas markets, deploying both uniformed and plainclothes officers. Neither police agency specified the threat, but the German news agency dpa said authorities were responding to signs of a possible attack by Islamic extremists, without citing a specific source. Michael Esser, head of the criminal investigation department of the Cologne police, said in a news release that the threat indications pointed to New Yearâ€™s Eve rather than Christmas, but added that â€œwe are putting everything possible in motion for the security of cathedral visitors on Christmas Eveâ€. Cologneâ€™s towering cathedral, whose twin spires are 157 metres (515 feet) tall, is a major tourist destination visited by some six million people a year. Police and cathedral officials urged those attending Mass on Sunday evening to arrive early and not bring bags or purses. The European Unionâ€™s home affairs commissioner, Ylva Johansson, warned on December 5 that Europe faces a â€œhuge risk of terrorist attacksâ€ over the Christmas holidays due to fall-out from the war between Israel and the Palestinian militant group Hamas.
